get.summary: Returns lag information on all datasets

DatasetUpdateMethod.description:
The method used to update a dataset;
  * Kafka - new updates are regularly ingested from Kafka topics
  * BigQuery - new updates are taken periodically from BigQuery tables
  * None - not updated, this dataset may be some static data that is unchanging

example.name: Flow D0150
example.notes: This is a dataset containing information on D0150 flows

DatasetLag.description:
Lag information for a dataset. Includes the dataset identity, whether or not the system beleives the dataset to be fresh or not and the last date that we beleive we have complete data for.

Some datasets may have dates that are far in the past and yet be considered fresh due to those datasets being historical and no longer updated.

Clients who want to know if the data should be relied upon should inspect the 'fresh' item and ignore the date.
